snippet.textDisplay:
When I was younger maybe around 10 (I'm 22 now) I used to thing that this song was fuelled by nightmares.. Turns out that I wasn't that far off the mark because I still get chills listening to this track.

But I love it.

snippet.textDisplay:
This guy was scaring the crap out of me when I play this for the 1st time... (10 years ago).
Agree with ya SupraDarky, but I'll add that this is one of the highlights in VIDEO GAMES in general!
Such a tense and memorable fight... Confusing, touching, everything! 
*sigh 
gotta replay this someday...
